name: recitations_by_chapter_number
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool quran_com.
Tool description: The default API of Quran.com website
API description: Fetches a list of ayah recitations for a specific Surah (chapter) based on the given chapter number and recitation ID.

chapter_number.description: The chapter (Surah) number for which to fetch the ayah recitations.

recitation_id.description: Recitation Id, you can get list of all ayah by ayah recitations using this endpoint #endpoint:HLbauN2sdGitPQPPL
